title: Romantic era painting of Finland's plight

content.question: Based on the painting, it can be inferred that Isto was most likely inspired by which of the following?

choices.label: Romanticism, which used strong emotions to foster a sense of shared local or national group identity
Realism, which depicted ordinary peopleâ€™s lives to draw attention to pressing social problems
Surrealism, which used depictions of dreams and visions to emphasize the newly discovered importance of irrational and subconscious motivations for human behavior
Primitivism, which adopted styles and subject matter derived from imperial encounters to open debates about European acquisition of colonies

content.answer: Romanticism, which used strong emotions to foster a sense of shared local or national group identity

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
